data.name: Store Cache
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}

    {{#if code}}
    <setBody>
        <groovy>
<![CDATA[{{safe code}}]]>
        </groovy>
    </setBody>
    {{/if}}
    <!-- Insertar todo el mapa en el cache -->
    <to uri="caffeine-cache://{{cache_name}}?action=PUT_ALL"/>
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
